message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than $12,000 to you. Considering this, I propose to sell it to you for $11,500. This is a special offer tailored specifically for you, and I'm confident it will provide you with significant value. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.
